name: Tsareena
description: The Fruit Pokémon. A master of grand and beautiful kicks, it can knock out even kickboxing champions with a single blow.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer from any negative status ailments in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Queenly Majesty
abilities.description: Creatures within line of sight of this Pokémon cannot use bonus actions to activate Moves. Moves that would normally have a Move Time of "1 bonus action" instead have a Move Time of "1 action".

abilities.name: Sweet Veil
abilities.description: Any ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is immune to the sleep condition.
